name: Mango Juice
description: Mango is a pulpy fruit which requires more liquids when blended to juice. Mango juice can do wonders to your body especially for the digestion.
directions: Wash mango thoroughly and chill. Peel the skin.
Cut the mango into cubes and add them to a blender and pour the coconut water or orange juice
Put in the other ingredients if using like ginger and mint
